vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(caddress.call(id, from, _tos[i], v)); // Adding require statement to check the result of call

	- require(bool)(caddress.call(id,from,_tos[i],v)) (patch_0.sol#9)
